name: Loss (Loss_CofC)
description:
Loss is a 2D pixel art platformer, created in Unity, where the player takes on the role of Death, the final of the Four Horsemen. As Death, you have lost memories due to unknown reasons and it is up to you to remember who you are and what is your purpose.

Loss takes places in an abandoned and overgrown mall where remnants of the havoc caused by the other horsemen is prevalent. Some gates are locked and will require keys to venture throughout. Other items such as health potions and helpful tools will be used to support the player through their adventure. A variety of puzzles are laid out across the world to make things a bit more interesting. 

Explore the Mall and Remember who you are!
